sections.text:
46-646.Orders or decisions; review.

Any person who feels aggrieved by any order or decision in connection with the granting or denial, in whole or in part, of an application for a permit or in connection with the revocation or modification of a permit may institute proceedings in the Court of Appeals in the manner provided for in section 61-207.

SourceLaws 1963, c. 276, ยง 9, p. 831;Laws 1991, LB 732, ยง 109;Laws 2000, LB 900, ยง 184.
